mapper.insert: INSERT INTO live_board( title, writer, username, content, crew, price, live_date, live_time, location, address, max_tickets, upd_date, sold_out ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{writer}, #{username}, #{content}, #{crew}, #{price}, #{liveDate}, #{liveTime}, #{location}, #{address}, #{maxTickets}, now(), 0 )
